title: Webb and Hubble examine spooky galaxy pair
summary: Stare deeply at these galaxies. They appear as if blood is pumping through the top of a flesh-free face. The long, ghastly ‘stare’ of their searing eye-like cores shines out into the supreme cosmic darkness.

title: ‘Blood-Soaked’ Eyes: NASA’s Webb, Hubble Examine Galaxy Pair
summary: Stare deeply at these galaxies. They appear as if blood is pumping through the top of a flesh-free face. The long, ghastly “stare” of their searing eye-like cores shines out into the supreme cosmic darkness. It’s good fortune that looks can be deceiving. These galaxies have only grazed one another to date, with the smaller […]

title: Europe says farewell to eclipse-making Proba-3
summary: ESA’s solar eclipse-making Proba-3 mission is about to leave Europe, to head to its launch site in India. The mission’s two spacecraft – which will manoeuvre precisely in Earth orbit so that one casts a shadow onto the other – have departed the facilities of Redwire Space in Kruibeke, Belgium. The pair will be flown to the Satish Dhawan Space Centre, near Chennai, for the launch campaign to begin.

title: CNES to Develop Medical Imaging Tech for Crewed Moon and Mars Missions
summary: French space agency CNES has issued a call for a medical imaging system, primarily for diagnostic purposes, to support space station operations and crewed missions to the surfaces of the Moon and Mars. The Multimodal Imaging for Space Exploration call is being carried out within the CNES Spaceship FR initiative. Introduced in 2018, the Spaceship […]

title: Valencia flood disaster
summary: Spain is suffering its worst flood in decades after torrential rains struck the eastern province of Valencia. These satellite images vividly illustrate the dramatic transformation of the landscape.

title: NASA updates list of Artemis 3 landing sites
summary: NASA has updated a list of candidate landing sites near the south pole of the moon for the Artemis 3 mission, taking into account surface conditions and capabilities of SpaceX’s Starship lander.

title: Happy Heraween!
summary: Robots in disguise: our Hera asteroid detective plus her CubeSat buddies  – Milani the rock decoder and Juventas the radar visionary – dressed up for Halloween!
